development.suggestion: If you have any suggestions or questions, please contact me at:

warnings.BOOKING_SUCCESSFUL_EMAIL_FAILED: Booking was successfully made, but failed to send confirmation email. Please contact the provider for more information

aboutUsPage.welcome: Welcome to Calencraft! I am delighted to introduce this platform, developed with passion and dedication. Calencraft is all about making it easy for you to discover and book a variety of services, from fitness classes to music lessons and much more.
aboutUsPage.goal: My goal with Calencraft is simple: to provide a seamless and enjoyable experience when searching for and booking services. Whether you want to start a new fitness routine or learn a new skill, Calencraft is here to help you find the perfect provider.
aboutUsPage.atCalencraft: At Calencraft, we are driven by a passion to help people like you connect with providers who can meet your needs. Transparency, reliability, and your satisfaction are at the heart of everything we do.
aboutUsPage.whosBehindDescription: It’s just me, the sole developer behind Calencraft! I am committed to creating a platform that exceeds your expectations and makes your life easier. From coding to design, I handle everything with care and attention to detail.
aboutUsPage.thankYouDescription: Thank you for choosing Calencraft. I am excited to continue developing and expanding the platform to serve you better!

email_editor.description: Click on the shorthand to substitute it. The system will automatically fill the placeholders with actual data.
email_editor.description_2: For example: In the welcome message, the $user (User) abbreviation will be replaced with the user's name.
email_editor.description_3: Please ensure that the email contains all important information, such as the location of the service, the time, and the service itself.

editor.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this item: {{item}}?
editor.fixed_time: Fixed, one time occasion. The service will be available only once in the interval.
editor.no_plan: You do not have an active subscription. Other users will not see your profile.
editor.name: Name
editor.billing_address_info: Billing address differs from home address
editor.session_days: Select which days the service is available.
editor.break_day: Select which days the break applies.

home.welcomeText1: Experience how easy it can be to book any service with Calencraft! Whether you need beauty treatments, home services, or educational classes, our platform makes booking a breeze, just for you.
home.welcomeText2: At Calencraft, we're here to simplify the way you manage your appointments. Say goodbye to hassles and enjoy a smooth, easy booking experience with us.

reasons.simpleSchedulingRest: Whatever service you're looking for—whether it's a haircut, home repair, or a class—you can book it in just a few clicks on our user-friendly platform.
reasons.diverseSelectionRest: Discover top-notch services from professional providers who are dedicated to delivering quality experiences. From wellness to household help and education, you’ll find everything you need.
reasons.expertGuidanceRest: Connect with trusted professionals who care about your satisfaction. Get tailored advice, services, and dependable support every step of the way.
reasons.tailoredPlansRest: Create a schedule that works for you! Pick the perfect times and choose services that meet your needs, whether for yourself or in a group.

features.trial: You can try out the available services
features.not_available: Your profile will not be available to others

features.available: Your profile will be available to others

delete.title: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
delete.content: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? After canceling, the previous features will not be available.
delete.warning: Other users will not see your profile, and your services will not be available.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to Calencraft's Privacy Policy! This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services. We take your privacy seriously and are committed to ensuring that your information is secure.
privacyPolicy.data_collection_content: When you use Calencraft, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and contact information. This information is used solely for the purpose of facilitating bookings and communicating with you regarding your bookings.
privacyPolicy.no_marketing: We do not use your personal information for marketing purposes or share it with third parties without your consent.
privacyPolicy.virtual_profiles_content: If you book a session on Calencraft without being authenticated, a virtual profile may be created in our database to represent you. This virtual profile is used solely for the purpose of managing your bookings and providing you with access to our services.
privacyPolicy.payment_data_security_content: Payment data provided during the booking process is secured by Stripe's payment service. Calencraft does not store your payment information on our servers. Stripe adheres to industry standards for data security to ensure that your payment data is protected.
privacyPolicy.check_privacy_policy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically for any changes.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.welcome: Welcome to Calencraft! By using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use. Please review the terms carefully.
termsOfService.booking_services_content: Calencraft provides a platform for users to book various services offered by providers. By booking a service through Calencraft, you agree to the terms and conditions set by the provider.
termsOfService.user_responsibility_content: Users are responsible for providing accurate information when booking services through Calencraft. Users must also adhere to the terms and conditions set by the provider.
termsOfService.provider_responsibility_content: Providers are responsible for delivering the services booked through Calencraft in a professional and timely manner. Providers must also adhere to the terms and conditions set by the user.
termsOfService.payment_terms_content: Currently, Calencraft does not support payment processing for users. Payment for booked services may be required upfront or upon completion, depending on the service provider's policies. Users are responsible for any applicable fees and charges associated with booking services.
termsOfService.disclaimer_content: Calencraft is not responsible for the quality or delivery of services booked through the platform. Users and providers are responsible for resolving any disputes or issues that may arise during the booking process.
termsOfService.changes_to_terms_content: Calencraft reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time. Users and providers are responsible for reviewing the terms periodically for any changes.
termsOfService.acceptance_of_terms: By using Calencraft, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
termsOfService.contact_us: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us.
